abstract: ABN Amro has appointed 26-year banking veteran Soh Wah Siaw as its head of consumer banking in China. The former HSBC executive will replace Linda Wong, who was promoted to the head of China operations for the investment bank last year.
lead_paragraph: ABN Amro has appointed 26-year banking veteran Soh Wah Siaw as its head of consumer banking in China. The former HSBC executive will replace Linda Wong, who was promoted to the head of China operations for the investment bank last year.
